thread.section_title: Lilium Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cute Hotel
thread.title_full: Cute Hotel - Review of Lilium Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: LupitaRC
title: Cute Hotel
text: This hotel is cute and the staff is friendly. It is a walk up and the elevator is tiny which is common in Europe so make sure you don't have that much luggage. It's not close to the tourist attractions so you will have to walk to the bus or metro station. I walk everywhere so I didn't mind it. The gelato next door has the best ever. Get the cone filled with nutella.
